description: A biological feature like a Gene, Protein, Cellular Structure.
title: Biological Feature

___feature_mods.comment: This property will be used to calculate the display_title of the feature - however a submitted preferred_label overrides this info.

___mod_type.description: One specific modification - list has suggested values.
___mod_type.title: Type of modification

___mod_position.description: The position relative to the feature - aa residue, base position or descriptive (eg. N-terminus)
___mod_position.title: Modified Position

___description.description: A short description of the feature
___description.title: Description

___cellular_structure.description: If the feature is a cellular structure such as a chromosome use this field and set type to 'cellular_component'
___cellular_structure.comment: When possible use a term_name from the GO:cellular_component ontology
___cellular_structure.title: Cellular Structure

___preferred_label.description: A provided label that can override the automatically calculated display_title - only submit if the calculated title does not work
___preferred_label.title: Preferred label

___organism_name.description: The organism that is the source of the BioFeature
___organism_name.title: Species

___relevant_genes.description: Gene or Gene(s) that a feature can be linked to.
___relevant_genes.comment: Usually a single ID but in some cases such as Histones that have multiple gene clusters or a region that contains more than one relevant gene can use multiple IDs
___relevant_genes.title: Gene

___genome_location.description: The location(s) of the feature on the genome
___genome_location.comment: A BioFeature can be a simple location and if so must have this field and appropriate type from SO
___genome_location.title: Genomic Location

items.description: Item indicating genome assembly, chromosome and coordinates of the region
items.title: Genomic Region

___feature_type.description: An (usually sequence) ontology term indicating the type of feature - eg. gene, protein, region
___feature_type.title: Feature Type
